languages.text: "Сначала докажи, что ты полез{mf|ен|на}. Справишься — и Злоба позаботится, чтобы у тебя были хорошие цацки. Не раньше. А пока можешь взять что-нибудь из барахла, которое нам не нужно". {n}Злоба указывает на контейнер, наполовину заполненный скверной экипировкой.{/n}

"Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Сначала докажи, что ты полез{mf|ен|на}. Справишься — и Злоба позаботится, чтобы у тебя были хорошие цацки. Не раньше. А пока можешь взять что-нибудь из барахла, которое нам не нужно". {n}Злоба указывает на контейнер, наполовину заполненный скверной экипировкой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

traits.locale_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: “你得先证明你自己有用。恶棍可以给你更像样的玩具让你玩，但你得先证明自己。至于现在，你可以从垃圾堆里随便挑点什么东西出来。”{n}恶棍指着一个半满的箱子，里面装着各种劣质装备。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你得先证明你自己有用。恶棍可以给你更像样的玩具让你玩，但你得先证明自己。至于现在，你可以从垃圾堆里随便挑点什么东西出来。”{n}恶棍指着一个半满的箱子，里面装着各种劣质装备。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: «Primero demuestra que me sirves de algo. Si lo haces, Malicia se ocupará de que tengas juguetitos decentes. Pero no antes. Mientras tanto, confórmate con algo del montón de chatarra». {n}Malicia gesticula en dirección a un contenedor medio lleno de equipo en estado lamentable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Primero demuestra que me sirves de algo. Si lo haces, Malicia se ocupará de que tengas juguetitos decentes. Pero no antes. Mientras tanto, confórmate con algo del montón de chatarra». {n}Malicia gesticula en dirección a un contenedor medio lleno de equipo en estado lamentable.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: 「まずは貴様の腕前を証明しろ。この仕事を無事にこなせば、このマリスが新しい武器を与えてやるが今は無理だ。どうしても必要なら、あのガラクタの山から適当な武器を拾え」{n}マリスは粗末な装備が半分ほど入ったコンテナを指差した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「まずは貴様の腕前を証明しろ。この仕事を無事にこなせば、このマリスが新しい武器を与えてやるが今は無理だ。どうしても必要なら、あのガラクタの山から適当な武器を拾え」{n}マリスは粗末な装備が半分ほど入ったコンテナを指差した。{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Beweist zunächst, dass Ihr nützlich seid. Dann sorgt Tücke dafür, dass Ihr ordentliche Spielsachen bekommt. Vorher jedoch nicht. Bis dahin könnt Ihr Euch etwas vom Schrotthaufen nehmen." {n}Tücke deutet auf einen Behälter voller abgenutzter Ausrüstung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beweist zunächst, dass Ihr nützlich seid. Dann sorgt Tücke dafür, dass Ihr ordentliche Spielsachen bekommt. Vorher jedoch nicht. Bis dahin könnt Ihr Euch etwas vom Schrotthaufen nehmen." {n}Tücke deutet auf einen Behälter voller abgenutzter Ausrüstung.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: « Commencez par me prouver votre utilité. Si vous faites ce que je vous demande, je vous procurerai des jouets dignes de ce nom, mais pas avant. En attendant, vous pouvez choisir ce que vous voulez dans la pile des rebuts. » {n}Démon vous indique de la main un conteneur à moitié rempli d'équipement décrépit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Commencez par me prouver votre utilité. Si vous faites ce que je vous demande, je vous procurerai des jouets dignes de ce nom, mais pas avant. En attendant, vous pouvez choisir ce que vous voulez dans la pile des rebuts. » {n}Démon vous indique de la main un conteneur à moitié rempli d'équipement décrépit.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger

languages.text: "Önce işe yarar olduğunu görelim. Vazifeni yerine getir ki Melanet sana daha güzel oyuncaklar versin. O vakte kadar kendine hurda yığınından bir şeyler beğenebilirsin." {n}Melanet, yarısına kadar pespaye aletlerle dolu konteyneri işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Prove that you're useful first. Do this and Malice will see that you have decent toys to play with. But not before. In the meantime, you can pick something out of the junk pile." {n}Malice gestures at a container half-full of shoddy equipment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Önce bir işe yaradığını görelim. Vazifeni yerine getir ki Melanet sana daha güzel oyuncaklar versin. O vakte kadar kendine hurda yığınından bir şeyler beğenebilirsin." {n}Melanet, yarısına kadar pespaye aletlerle dolu konteynere işaret ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Anger
